title: The Curse: A Cultural History of Menstruation
description: "In its hard headed, richly documented concreteness, it is worth a thousand polemics."-- New York Times , from a review of the first edition"The Curse deserves a place in every women's studies library collection."-- Sharon Golub , editor of Lifting the curse of Menstruation"A stimulating and useful book, both for the scholarly and the general reader."-- Paula A. Treichler , co-author of A Feminist Dictionary
author: Janice Delaney
